mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_postcode, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_agree, mem_profileimg, mem_regdate from dditmember where mem_id = #{memId}
mapper.insert: insert into dditmember( mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_postcode, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_agree, mem_profileimg, mem_regdate ) values ( seq_dditmember.nextval, #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memPostCode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memAgree}, #{memProfileImg}, sysdate )
